Let’s Listen and Say 1 2 43 Where’s my blue shirt, Mum? It’s in your schoolbag. Where’re my brown shoes, Mum? They’re under the chair. Where’s my new coat, Mum? Where’s my new cap? It’s on the bed. It’s on your head! 8 Let’s Learn Let’s Act 12 It’s under the desk. behindbesidebetween capglasseswatch Lingling, where’s your book? Peter, where’s your cap? It’s on my head. 9 Let’s Read Let’s Read and Write 43 1 2 Where’s my book? Please stand up, Dino. You are clever. Here it is. Thank you, Dino. Five birds fly into Mary’s room. The room is clean. They like it very much. We can see the blue bird on the chair. The red bird is under the chair. The brown bird is beside the books. The white bird and the black bird are on the desk. They are between the caps. Fill in the blanks. 1. The blue bird is the chair. 2. The white bird is the caps. 3. Where is the yellow bird? It’s . 4. How many birds can you see? I put it on my desk. Where is it? 10 Let’s Chant Let’s Have Fun Blow, blow, blow! Come and blow the balloon. The balloon is blue. Blow, blow, blow. bl Help Peter to find his things. Where are his pen, cap, cup, book, basketball, T-shirt, watch, schoolbag and glasses? Unit 2 Spring is warm. Let’s Listen and Say 11 I’m from Sanya. I don’t like summer. It’s hot in Sanya. I’m from Kunming

Draw a if you like to do it. Draw a if you don’t. 1. Name toys. 2. Ask about the prices of things. 1. Ask about the things your friends have. 2. Rhyme and act. That’s a nice puppet. How much is it? Do you have any money? No, I don’t. One, two, tie my shoe. 65 Let’s Read More St. Patrick’s Day is a holiday in the UK. People wear green clothes on that day. Who is St. (Saint) Patrick? St. Patrick is a wise man and good teacher. At that time, people in the country are having a hard time. The farmers cannot grow more food. People are hungry. So, they ask St. Patrick for help. He shows them clover and how clover can make their land better. The farmers learn from his teaching. Their land gets better. They can have more food. The people are very happy. St. Patrick’s Day Activity Stories from Around the World The farmers learn from St. Patrick. clover Paste a clover leaf here. Look at the picture of the clover. Can you find a clover leaf? a hard timegrowfoodcloverbetter Guess, Check and Learn This is a clover. It can make your land better. Thank you! clover THE U K 66 Let’s Read More Qinmou is a little golden monkey. He lives with his father and mother on a mountain in Sichuan. One day, a big truck and lots of men come to the mountain. They cut down all the trees. The golden monkeys have no home to live in. There are no more trees on the mountain. Qinmou cannot find his father and mother. He cannot find his friends. Winter comes and Qinmou cannot find things to eat. There are no more fruit and flowers. So Qinmou is very hungry. On one cold morning, Qinmou dies

chunks.content: . One day, a big truck and lots of men come to the mountain. They cut down all the trees. The golden monkeys have no home to live in. There are no more trees on the mountain. Qinmou cannot find his father and mother. He cannot find his friends. Winter comes and Qinmou cannot find things to eat. There are no more fruit and flowers. So Qinmou is very hungry. On one cold morning, Qinmou dies. How can we help the golden monkeys? Golden Monkeys of Sichuan Activity Stories from Around the World golden monkeytruckcut downfruitdie Guess, Check and Learn Answer “Y” (yes) or “N” (no). Qinmou, I love you! 1. This is a happy story. ( ) 2. Monkeys live in trees. ( ) 3. Some people cut down trees on the mountain. ( ) 4. Golden monkeys eat fruit and flowers. ( ) Help! Sichuan CHINA truck The man cuts down the trees. I can see a river. a lake. a boat. the blue sky. white clouds. Can you write in English? draw? dance? Yes, I can. No, I can’t. I can see a river. I can see a lake and a boat. What can you see? Today is Saturday. Tuesday. My name is Mingming. I come from China. Where are you from? I come from China. the USA. the UK. France. 77 Unit 9 Unit 10 He has two feet. two hands.
